docs.snippet: Taking a swipe at "Obamacare" on Twitter, President-elect Donald Trump correctly identified two of its most pressing problems — a spike in premiums and high deductibles. But he failed to acknowledge the subsidies that soften the hit for many...
docs.lead_paragraph: Taking a swipe at "Obamacare" on Twitter, President-elect Donald Trump correctly identified two of its most pressing problems — a spike in premiums and high deductibles. But he failed to acknowledge the subsidies that soften the hit for many consumers, though not all.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Hit-And-Miss 'Obamacare' Tweet
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Hit-And-Miss 'Obamacare' Tweet
